Text:
PLEASE TAKE NOTE
First open up your daw application....eg Cubase....fruity Loops ...etc
THEN open nexus 2.....
THEN import the .nxp file.....
THEN close Nexus.........dont do anything else.
THAT Means dont browse inside nexus for sounds etc....
Then close your DaW APP
THEN COPY the Pressets folder to nexus2\content\Pressets|.....
THEN RESTART your DaW app 
Load up Nexus and HIhaaa...they should all be there.
and Happy New Year to all
